meaning: a vulnerable spot or weakness

translation_zh: 在解剖课上，我们研究了[[他的跟腱]]及其作用

meaning: an unwelcome intruder in a place or situation.

source: The mysterious case was [[a hard nut to crack]] for the detective

translation_ko: 그 신비한 사건은 탑정에겐 [[풀리지 않는 난제]]였습니다.

meaning: a problem that is difficult to solve
source: The thick shell made the walnut [[a hard nut to crack]] with bare hands
label: literal
translation_ko: 두꺼운 껍질은 그 호두를 맨손으로 [[까기는 어려운 견과]]로 만들었습니다.
translation_zh: 厚实的外壳让核桃[[难以被徒手打开]]

translation_ko: 저녁 포틀럭 파티에서 가지각색의 요리를 전부 조금씩 시도한 그의 [[접시에는 많은 것이 담겨 있었습니다]].

translation_ko: 그들은 함께 작업하며 다양한 용액의 pH를 측정해야 했기에 그 화학 실험은 [[그들간의 관계를 측정하는 산성 시험]]이었습니다.

meaning: applying to everyone
source: The chess master made [[improvements across the board]] by adjusting the positions of his pieces
label: literal
translation_ko: 체스 마스터는 말의 위치를 조정하며 [[전 체스판을 걸친 향상]]을 이루어냈습니다.

meaning: an action, whether verbal or physical that makes a bad situation even worse
source: By spreading rumors, [[they added fuel to the flames]] of the ongoing conflict

source: To keep the bonfire going, [[they added fuel to the flames]] by throwing more wood
label: literal
translation_ko: 불장작을 계속 타오르게 하기 위해, 그들은 더 많은 나무를 던져서 [[불길에 연료를 추가했습니다]].

meaning: in a great hurry to finish something before a particular time

label: figurative
translation_ko: 그의 직장을 그만두는 결정은 가족의 반대를 무릅쓴 [[정상에 어긋난 행동]]이었습니다.

meaning: a difficult path to be followed

meaning: used to convey that you cannot understand what is being said or written

translation_ko: 그가 양자약학에 대해 설명하기 시작했을 때 [[저는 하나도 알아들을 수 없었습니다]]

translation_ko: 그 언어를 잘 모르는 제가 그리스의 신문을 읽으면 [[그것은 제게 그리스어 투성이입니다]]

translation_ko: 동선 수집가는 그 희귀한 [[동전이 땅에 떨어지기 전에 잡기 위해 준비가 되어있었습니다]]
translation_zh: 硬币收集者已[[为银币的掉落准备好]]，以抓到这稀有的硬币

meaning: in charge of an organization, group of people, etc.
source: She was [[at the helm of the project]], guiding the team to success
label: figurative
translation_zh: 她[[掌舵]]这个项目，带领团队走向成功

meaning: in charge of an organization, group of people, etc.
source: The captain stood [[at the helm of the project]], steering the ship through the storm
label: literal
translation_zh: 船长[[在舵旁]]站着，操纵船穿越风暴

meaning: have a private or selfish reason for doing something
source: He [[had an axe to grind]] with his coworker after the disagreement
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그는 의견 충돌 이후 그의 직장 동료와 함께 [[다른 속셈이 생겼습니다]]
translation_zh: 他在和同事争论之后[[心怀鬼胎]]

meaning: have a private or selfish reason for doing something
source: The lumberjack [[had an axe to grind]] before chopping down the tree
label: literal
translation_ko: 나무꾼에게는 나무를 베기 전에 [[갈아야할 도끼가 있었습니다]]
translation_zh: 伐木工人在砍树之前要[[磨斧头]]

meaning: to be in a tough situation with limited options
source: With no other options left, [[he had his back against the wall]] and had to make a decision
label: figurative
translation_ko: 다른 선택이 없기에 [[그는 궁지에 몰린 채로]] 결정을 내려야만 했습니다
translation_zh: 在选择耗尽后，他[[被逼到墙角]]，必须做出抉择

meaning: to be in a tough situation with limited options
source: [[He had his back against the wall]] while waiting for the elevator
label: literal
translation_ko: [[그는]] 엘리베이터를 기다리는 동안 [[벽에 등을 기대고 있었습니다]]
translation_zh: 他在等电梯时把[[背靠着墙壁上]]

meaning: people who work in anonymity
source: The company's success was largely due to [[the backroom boys]] who worked tirelessly behind the scenes
label: figurative
translation_ko: 회사의 성공은 대부분 뒤에서 끊임없이 일하는 [[막후의 인물들]] 덕분이었습니다
translation_zh: 对于这家公司的成功，那些[[幕后工作者们]]功不可没，他们在幕后不知疲倦地工作。

meaning: people who work in anonymity
source: In the storage area, [[the backroom boys]] were busy organizing and restocking shelves
label: literal
translation_ko: 창고에서 [[재고 담당 일꾼]]들은 열심히 재고를 정리하고 다시 채우는 데 바빴습니다
translation_zh: [[后勤人员]]正在储藏区辛苦地整理和填充货架。

meaning: someone who fails to meet expectations
source: Despite his charming demeanor, he [[turned out to be a bad egg]] in the company
label: figurative
translation_ko: 매력적인 품행에도 불구하고 그는 회사에서 [[믿지 못할 나쁜 사람으로 드러났습니다]]
translation_zh: 尽管他的行为举止很有魅力，[[事实证明他不]]是公司的一名[[称职]]员工。

meaning: someone who fails to meet expectations
source: The carton of eggs we bought [[turned out to be a bad egg]] when we cracked it open
label: literal
translation_ko: 달걀을 깨서 열자 우리가 샀던 달걀판이 [[나쁜 달걀이었다는 것으로 드러났습니다]]
translation_zh: 当我们把买来的鸡蛋敲开时，[[发现它们变质了]]。

meaning: a burden or problem that ties you down and prevents you from doing what you want
source: He felt like he [[was carrying a ball and chain]] with his overwhelming responsibilities
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그는 막중한 책임으로 인해 자신을 [[구속하는 짐을 짊어지고 있는 것]] 같다고 느꼈습니다
translation_zh: 他感觉自己就像[[身背千钧重负]]，因为他肩负了太多责任。

meaning: a burden or problem that ties you down and prevents you from doing what you want
source: The prisoner [[was carrying a ball and chain]] as a part of his punishment
label: literal
translation_ko: 죄수는 처벌의 일부로 [[공과 사슬을 옮기고 있었습니다]]
translation_zh: 这名囚犯身负[[铁球和铁链]]，作为对他惩罚的一部分。

meaning: most basic and important elements or facts
source: During the meeting, she [[presented the bare bones]] of the project plan
label: figurative
translation_ko: 회의 도중 그녀는 프로젝트 계획의 [[기본적인 틀을 제시했습니다]]
translation_zh: 她在会议中[[展示了]]项目计划的[[精髓]]。

meaning: most basic and important elements or facts
source: The archaeologist [[presented the bare bones]] of the ancient skeleton
label: literal
translation_ko: 고고학자는 고대 골격의 [[맨뼈를 보였습니다]]
translation_zh: 考古学家[[展示了]]古代尸骸的[[裸露的骨头]]。

meaning: waste one's efforts by pursuing the wrong thing or path
source: Accusing her of stealing the documents [[was barking up the wrong tree]]
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그녀를 문서 도용 혐의로 몰아붙이는 것은 [[엉뚱한 사람을 잘못 짚은 것이었습니다]]
translation_zh: 对她盗窃文档的指控是[[南辕北辙]]的。

meaning: waste one's efforts by pursuing the wrong thing or path
source: The confused dog [[was barking up the wrong tree]], as the squirrel had already moved to another one
label: literal
translation_ko: 다른 나무로 다람쥐가 옮겨가자 혼란에 빠진 개는 [[잘못된 나무를 향해 짖고 있었습니다]]
translation_zh: 那条迷惑的狗[[正朝着错误的树狂吠]]，因为那只松鼠已经跑到另一棵树上了。

meaning: to be silly and slightly crazy and behave in a confused way
source: His wild theories and peculiar behavior made others think he [[had bats in the belfry]]
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그의 거침없는 이론과 기행적인 행실은 사람들로 하여금 그가 [[정신이 이상하다고]] 생각하게 만들었습니다
translation_zh: 他那些荒诞的理论和奇怪的举止令人觉得他[[脑子进水了]]。

meaning: to be silly and slightly crazy and behave in a confused way
source: The old church tower [[had bats in the belfry]] that flew out at dusk
label: literal
translation_ko: 오래된 교회 탑에는 매 황혼마다 날아오르는 [[박쥐가 종탑에]] 있었습니다
translation_zh: 那幢老教堂的[[钟楼里有一些蝙蝠]]，它们会在黄昏时飞走。

meaning: to get ready for trouble
source: When the company announced layoffs, employees had [[to batten down the hatches]] and prepare for the worst
label: figurative
translation_ko: 회사가 감원을 발표하자 직원들은 [[위기에 대비하여]] 최악의 사태를 고려해두어야 했습니다
translation_zh: 当公司宣布裁员时，员工们需要[[做好心理准备]]，并做好最坏的打算。

meaning: to get ready for trouble
source: As the storm approached, the sailors rushed [[to batten down the hatches]] on the ship
label: literal
translation_ko: 폭풍이 다가오자 선원들은 서둘러 [[배의 갑판을 단단히 고정했습니다]]
translation_zh: 当风暴接近时，水手们忙着去[[钉上]]船上的[[扣板并密闭舱口]]。

meaning: want somebody to be hurt or punished.
source: The angry mob was [[baying for blood]] after the politician's scandal
label: figurative
translation_zh: 由于政客的丑闻，愤怒的暴徒[[期望其接受惩罚]]。

meaning: want somebody to be hurt or punished.
source: The pack of hungry wolves was [[baying for blood]] as they hunted their prey
label: literal
translation_zh: 一群饿狼在寻找猎物，它们[[喊出对鲜血的渴望]]。

meaning: doing or saying things which are certain to cause a serious disagreement or a fight between them.
source: Their opposing political views put them [[on a collision course with each other]]
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그들의 대립적인 정치적 견해는 [[그들의 의견 충돌을 불가피하게]] 했습니다
translation_zh: 对立的政治观念让他们[[势如水火]]。

meaning: doing or saying things which are certain to cause a serious disagreement or a fight between them.
source: The two ships, sailing at full speed, were [[on a collision course with each other]]
label: literal
translation_ko: 최고 속도로 항해하는 두 척의 배는 [[서로 충돌하는 경로에]] 있었습니다
translation_zh: 两艘船正[[在即将相撞的航线上]]全速行驶。

meaning: avoid talking about the main topic
source: If you have something to say, just [[stop beating around the bush]] and tell me
label: figurative
translation_ko: 당신이 말하고 싶은 것이 있다면, [[요점을 피하지 말고]] 곧이 곧대로 말해주십시오
translation_zh: 你有话直说，不要[[东拉西扯]]。

meaning: avoid talking about the main topic
source: If you want to trim the garden, [[stop beating around the bush]] and start cutting it
label: literal
translation_ko: 당신이 정원을 다듬고 싶다면 [[덤불 언저리를 두들기는 것을 멈추고]] 곧바로 자르기 시작하십시오
translation_zh: 如果你想修剪花园，就开始给那些[[灌木]]剪枝吧，[[别再捶打它们了]]。

meaning: to speak eagerly about something you support
source: He tirelessly [[beat the drum for the cause]] to raise awareness about climate change
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그는 기후 변화에 대한 인식을 높이기 위해 지치지 않고 [[홍보를 계속했습니다]]
translation_zh: 他孜孜不倦地为唤醒大家对气候变化的意识而[[大声疾呼]]。

meaning: to speak eagerly about something you support
source: The musician [[beat the drum for the cause]] during the charity concert
label: literal
translation_ko: 음악가는 자선 콘서트 동안 [[대의를 위해 북을 울렸습니다]]
translation_zh: 这名音乐工作者在慈善音乐会中负责[[敲鼓]]。

meaning: be possessed with one thought or scheme
source: She [[had a bee in her bonnet]] about the new policy changes
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그녀는 새로운 정책 변경에 대한 [[생각에 사로잡혀 있었습니다]]
translation_zh: 她对新的政策变化[[耿耿于怀]]。

meaning: be possessed with one thought or scheme
source: During the picnic, she accidentally [[had a bee in her bonnet]] and panicked
label: literal
translation_ko: 소풍 도중 그녀는 어쩌다 [[모자 안에 벌이 들어가자]] 당황하여 어쩔 줄을 몰라했습니다
translation_zh: 在野餐时，[[一只]]意外[[出现在她帽子里的蜜蜂]]使她感到惊慌。

meaning: specially made for a particular purpose
source: The job opportunity [[has been tailor made]] for her skills and experience
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그 취업 기회는 그녀의 기술과 경험에 [[안성맞춤이었습니다]]
translation_zh: 这个工作机会是为她的技能和经验[[量身定做]]的。

meaning: specially made for a particular purpose
source: The suit [[has been tailor made]] to fit his measurements perfectly
label: literal
translation_ko: 이 정장은 그의 치수에 완벽하게 맞도록 [[맞춤 제작되었습니다]]
translation_zh: 这套西装[[是裁衣匠]]根据他的尺寸[[量身定做的]]。

meaning: to suddenly begin to understand
source: After hours of studying, he finally [[began to see the light]] and understood the concept
label: figurative
translation_ko: 몇 시간의 공부 끝에 그는 마침내 [[깨달음을 얻고]] 개념을 이해하기 [[시작했습니다]]
translation_zh: 经过了数小时的学习，他终于[[看到了曙光]]，弄懂了那个概念。

meaning: to suddenly begin to understand
source: As the sun rose, she [[began to see the light]] streaming through the window
label: literal
translation_ko: 태양이 떠오르자 그녀는 창문을 통해 [[흐르는 빛을 보았습니다]]
translation_zh: 当太阳升起来时，她[[开始看到阳光]]穿过窗户照射进来。

meaning: excited and full of nervous energy
source: The kids were [[bouncing off the walls]] after eating too much candy
label: figurative
translation_ko: 아이들은 너무 많은 사탕을 먹고 난 뒤 [[몹시 흥분해 있었습니다]]
translation_zh: 孩子们在吃了太多糖果后[[欢呼雀跃]]。

meaning: excited and full of nervous energy
source: The rubber ball kept [[bouncing off the walls]] in the small room
label: literal
translation_ko: 작은 방 안에서 고무 공은 계속해서 [[벽에 튕겨졌습니다]]
translation_zh: 橡胶球在小房间的[[墙壁间]]不停地[[弹跳]]。

meaning: do all in one's power (usually to achieve something or accommodate somebody)
source: I always [[bend over backwards for them]] to make sure they're happy
label: figurative
translation_ko: 저는 항상 그들이 행복을 확인하기 위해 [[안간힘을 씁니다]]
translation_zh: 为了确保他们快乐，我总是[[全力以赴]]。

meaning: do all in one's power (usually to achieve something or accommodate somebody)
source: During the yoga class, we had to [[bend over backwards for them]] to demonstrate the pose
label: literal
translation_ko: 요가 수업 동안 우리는 자세를 시범으로 보이기 위해 [[허리를 숙였습니다]]
translation_zh: 在瑜伽课上，我们通过[[向后折叠身体]]来演示这个动作。

meaning: to become angry.
source: He [[got bent out of shape]] when he found out his favorite band was sold out
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그는 자신이 가장 좋아하는 밴드의 티켓이 매진되었다는 사실을 알고 [[몹시 화가 났습니다]]
translation_zh: 听说喜爱的乐队票卖光了，他[[勃然大怒]]。

meaning: to become angry.
source: The metal rod [[got bent out of shape]] after the car accident
label: literal
translation_ko: 자동차 사고 이후 금속 막대의 [[형태가 찌그러졌습니다]]
translation_zh: 那根金属杆在车祸中被撞得[[弯曲变了形]]。

meaning: to talk to someone for a very long time about something boring
source: The speaker [[bent their ears]] with his captivating stories
label: figurative
translation_ko: 발표자는 그의 매혹적인 이야기로 [[오랜 시간동안 말을 이어나갔습니다]]
translation_zh: 演讲者用他精彩的故事[[征服了听众]]。

meaning: to talk to someone for a very long time about something boring
source: The strong wind [[bent their ears]] as they walked through the storm
label: literal
translation_ko: 그들이 폭풍을 뚫고 걸어가자 강력한 바람이 그들의 [[귀를 휘어지게 했습니다]]
translation_zh: 在穿越风暴时，狂风[[吹弯了他们的耳朵]]。

meaning: support a person or thing that ultimately fails
source: [[She bet on the wrong horse]] when she chose to invest in that failing company
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그녀는 실패한 회사에 투자를 함으로써 [[잘못된 선택을 했습니다]]
translation_zh: 当她选择投资那个即将倒闭的公司时，[[她押错了宝]]。

meaning: support a person or thing that ultimately fails
source: At the racetrack, [[she bet on the wrong horse]] and lost her money
label: literal
translation_ko: 경마장에서 그녀는 [[잘못된 말에 돈을 걸었고]] 돈을 잃었습니다
translation_zh: 在赛马场，[[她押注了错误的马匹]]，输了她的赌注。

idiom: between a rock and a hard place
meaning: having two very bad choices
source: He was [[caught between a rock and a hard place]] when he had to choose between his job and his family
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그는 자신의 일과 가족 중 하나를 골라야하는 [[곤란한 처지에 놓였습니다]]
translation_zh: 他在工作和家庭之间[[难以取舍]]。

idiom: between a rock and a hard place
meaning: having two very bad choices
source: While hiking, she found herself [[caught between a rock and a hard place]] in a narrow passage
label: literal
translation_ko: 등산 도중 그녀는 좁은 통로에서 [[암석과 단단한 무언가에 갇혀 움직이지 못하게 되었습니다]]
translation_zh: 在徒步时，她在一个狭窄的通道里[[被一块岩石和一条困难的路径卡住了]]。

meaning: a secret to be kept between two people
source: [[Between you and me, there's a secret]] that I can't share with anyone else
label: figurative
translation_zh: [[我俩之间有个]]不可告人的[[秘密]]。

meaning: a secret to be kept between two people
source: He placed a mysterious box [[between you and me, there's a secret]] hidden inside it
label: literal
translation_zh: 他把一个神秘的盒子放[[在]]了[[咱俩之间]]，其中藏着一个秘密。

meaning: In an inexplicable or concealed place or condition, especially the mysterious state of existence after death.
source: The psychic claimed [[she looked beyond the veil]] and communicated with spirits
label: figurative
translation_ko: 예언자는 [[그녀가 저승을 볼 수 있고]] 영혼과 대화할 수 있다고 주장했습니다
translation_zh: 那位通灵者称[[她揭开了神秘的面纱]]并与灵魂进行了交流。

meaning: In an inexplicable or concealed place or condition, especially the mysterious state of existence after death.
source: Standing in front of the window, [[she looked beyond the veil]] and saw the beautiful garden
label: literal
translation_ko: 창문 앞에 서서 [[그녀는 베일 저편을 바라보다가]] 아름다운 정원을 발견했습니다
translation_zh: [[她]]站在窗前[[透过纱窗]]看到了美丽的花园。

meaning: A large organization or government agency that tries to control all aspects of human life and society.
source: With the new surveillance system, we felt like we were being [[watched by big brother]]
label: figurative
translation_ko: 새로운 감시 시스템 때문에 우리는 [[거대한 독재 권력에게 주시당하고 있는 것]] 같았습니다
translation_zh: 随着全新监控系统的出现，我们感觉[[被老大哥监视了]]。

meaning: A large organization or government agency that tries to control all aspects of human life and society.
source: As the younger sibling, she was always [[watched by big brother]] during their childhood
label: literal
translation_ko: 그녀는 여동생으로서 어렸을 때 항상 [[큰오빠에게 감시당했습니다]]
translation_zh: 作为妹妹，她在童年时总是[[被哥哥看护着]]。

meaning: a very powerful individual
source: To solve the complex problem, we had [[to bring in the big gun]] from the head office
label: figurative
translation_ko: 복잡한 문제를 해결하기 위해 우리는 본사에서 [[고급 거물들을 끌어들여야]] 했습니다
translation_zh: 为解决这个复杂问题，我们需要从总部办公室[[请来强力外援]]。

meaning: a very powerful individual
source: To defend the fort, they had [[to bring in the big gun]] from the armory
label: literal
translation_ko: 요새를 방어하기 위해서 그들은 무기고에서 [[커다란 총을 옮겨와야]] 했습니다
translation_zh: 为了防守要塞，他们需要从军火库[[拿来重枪]]。

meaning: someone who talks too much
source: He can't keep a secret, he [[has a big mouth]]
label: figurative
translation_ko: 그는 비밀을 지키지 못합니다, 그는 [[말이 너무 많거든요]]
translation_zh: 他无法保守秘密，因为他[[是个大嘴巴]]。

meaning: someone who talks too much
source: The hippopotamus [[has a big mouth]] to consume large amounts of food
label: literal
translation_ko: 하마는 거대한 양의 음식을 섭취하기 위해 [[큰 입을 가지고 있습니다]]
translation_zh: 河马[[有很大的嘴巴]]可以吃大量食物。

meaning: to have other, more important things to do.
source: I can't focus on this minor issue, [[I have bigger fish to fry]] at work
label: figurative
translation_ko: 저는 이런 사소한 문제에 집중할 수 없습니다, [[제가]] 직장에서 [[따로 해야할 더 중대한 일이 있거든요]]
translation_zh: 我无法集中精力处理这件小事，因为[[我]]在工作中[[有更重要的事情需要处理]]。

meaning: to have other, more important things to do.
source: I can't cook these small ones now, [[I have bigger fish to fry]] for the dinner party
